products.name: Neutrogena Fresh Foaming Cleanser

products.description: A herbal-based face wash that cleanses and purifies the skin, infused with neem and turmeric.

products.name: CeraVe Hydrating Cleanser
products.description: A hydrating cleanser that gently removes dirt and oil without stripping the skin's natural moisture.

products.name: L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Bright Reveal Brightening Foaming Cleanser
products.description: A cleanser designed to brighten the skin and smooth uneven texture, revealing youthful radiance.

products.name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion

products.name: The Ordinary Natural Moisturizing Factors + HA
